ARABIC: قَالَ يَٰقَوْمِ لَيْسَ بِى سَفَاهَةٌ وَلَٰكِنِّى رَسُولٌ مِّن رَّبِّ ٱلْعَٰلَمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He said, 'My people, I am by no means a fool, but rather am a Messenger from the Lord of all the worlds,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I am not a fool, O people," he answered, "but have been sent by the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He said: 'O my people! There is no folly in me; rather I am a Messenger from the Lord of the universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He replied, "My people, I am not a fool but a Messenger of the Lord of the Universe.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: He said, “O my people! I do not have any concern with foolishness and I am in fact a Noble Messenger from the Lord Of The Creation.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (Hud) said: "O my people! There is no foolishness in me, but (I am) a Messenger from the Lord of all that exists!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: He said: O my people! there is no folly in me, but I am an apostle of the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Said he, 'My people, there is no folly in me; but I am a Messenger from the Lord of all Being.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: He said: O my people! There is no foolishness in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: He said, "My people, I am by no means a fool, but rather am a messenger from the Lord of the Universe,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: He said: O my people! not with me is folly, but I am an apostle from the Lord of the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: He said, ‘O my people, I am not in folly. Rather, I am an apostle from the Lord of all the worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: He said: "O my people! I am no imbecile, but (I am) a messenger from the Lord and Cherisher of the worlds!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (Hud) said: "O my people! There is no foolishness in me, but (I am) a Messenger from the Lord of the 'Alamin (mankind, jinns and all that exists)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My nation, there is no foolishness in me' he replied. 'I am a Messenger of the Lord of the Worlds
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He said, “O my people! There is no foolishness in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Hud] said, "O my people, there is not foolishness in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the worlds."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:67] He said, ‘O my people, there is no folly in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (He said: my people; There is no foolishness) ignorance (in me, but I am a messenger from the Lord of the Worlds) to you.
